Twister


*Twister pulls her double sided sword out and awaits the Maximals=
*


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 6:02 PM
  Subject: Re: Something ami=
ss...


  Dracona eyed the base, this would be a good time to try to make a=
 deal with the Maximals. But Dracona was not one to come back to bots who d=
idn't apreciate her. Dracona knew Plintissa was a sucker, the Maximals woul=
d use Plintissa again and again but Plintissa would not just leave them! Dr=
acona turned to Twister.

  "A good way to bring them out is to fire at the=
 base." Dracona said. Dracona lifted up a HUGE fifle, a variation of the He=
avy Blaster Rifle, except this one was so big she had to hold it with both =
hands. Dracona fired at the base's shield...
    ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednes=
day, August 02, 2000 4:22 PM
    Subject: Re: Something amiss...


    Twis=
ter

    *Twister arives at the Maximal Base out of AutoGun range. She look=
s at it staring*


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE =

      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 4:09 =
PM
      Subject: Re: Something amiss...


      Dracona arives close to th=
e Maximal base, maybe she can do some carnage while she was here...
       =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 3:56 PM
       =
 Subject: Re: Something amiss...


        Twister
         
        *Twist=
er continues walking on in the direction of the Maximal Base*


          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 3:39 PM
          S=
ubject: Re: Something amiss...


          Dracona follows Twister...
     =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
   =
         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 20=
00 2:59 PM
            Subject: Re: Something amiss...


            Twiste=
r


            *Twister looks down and stands up leaving the base*

      =
      Twister: I'll be back soon....I hope....

            *Twister says i=
nto her Commlink to Dracona as she heads out towards the Maximal Base*


  =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
    =
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, August 02,=
 2000 2:20 PM
              Subject: Re: Something amiss...


             =
 Dracona smiles.

              "I suggest you and me take a trip to the Ma=
ximal base and find some to kill." Dracona said to Twister...
             =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
   =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, Augus=
t 02, 2000 4:27 AM
                Subject: Re: Something amiss...


      =
          Twister
                 
                 
                *Twis=
ter looks at Dracona*

                Twister: It's not my fault if there =
are no bots around. I don't know where to find them. Who would you suggest?=


                *Twister asks Dracona*


                  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 1:52 AM
=
                  Subject: Re: Something amiss...


                  "I do=
n't know, but if you don't get ready to pay." Dracona said to Twister...She=
 meant it..
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
       From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                   Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 11:47 PM
                =
    Subject: Re: Something amiss...


                                     =
            Twister


                    *Twister looks at Dracona*

     =
               Twister: Like who and where would I find someone?

         =
           *Twister asks Dracona*
                      ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
                      To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 8:4=
5 PM
                      Subject: Something amiss...


                  =
    "Nothing, except you should go out and kill someone." Dracona said to T=
wister...
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
             From: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 3:46 AM
   =
                     Subject: Re: The End Is Near..........................=
.........................


                        ~~~~~~Twister~~~~~~
   =
                      
                         
                        *T=
wister looks at Dracona*

                        Twister: Hi....Anything n=
ew?

                        *Twister asks Dracona while looking at the wal=
l*
